page.title: 03Transport in Elton/Birchover
page.content: There is no public transport serving Gratton parish but there is a very limited bus service provided by Silver Service to Elton and Birchover. The latter is two-hourly from and to Matlock and Bakewell with the last bus leaving both towns at about 5.15 p.m. There is no Sunday service but an extra mid-evening bus runs to Matlock on Wednesdays, Fridays and Saturdays and returns from Matlock at 10.30 p.m. Almost every working family owns at least one vehicle with some owning two or more. Households without transport are mainly occupied by old age pensioners. The nearest railway station is at Matlock with twelve trains a day running to and from Derby.
